articles.author: Cat Woods
articles.title: ‘The Bad Guys’ and the Crossroads Its Author Faced - The New York Times
articles.description: Unable to support his family with his children’s books, Aaron Blabey was ready to give up. Then he came up with the concept that’s now a best seller and an animated movie.
articles.content:
Then what happened?
All of those ideas converged on a walk through the countryside in 2014, and when I wrote the idea down with all the character names, I texted a friend and said, What do you think… [+1470 chars]
